title: Three track
creator_credit: Beryl Fox, Don Hopkins, Gilbert Taylor and Intercom Films
brief_description: Looks at a ski school for pupils with physical disabilities. These ski devotees are coached by dedicated volunteer instructors from the Canadian Ski Alliance. They have worked together to accomplish what for some might seem an impossible task: to master the sport of skiing.
creator_credit_for_label: Beryl Fox, Don Hopkins, Gilbert Taylor and Intercom Films
